description:
Installing 2011.1~bzr487 from the trunk Ubuntu PPA.
The services start up but they fail to log to /var/log/nova. The only service logging (to "/var/log/nova/-") is the objectstore.
title: No more logging with trunk Ubuntu packages

comments.content:
Installing 2011.1~bzr487 from the trunk Ubuntu PPA.
The services start up but they fail to log to /var/log/nova. The only service logging (to "/var/log/nova/-") is the objectstore.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Looks like the upstart scripts should redirect stderr to the log files, so it's a fix in the Ubuntu packaging branch.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Fixed about an hour ago in the packaging branch. PPA packages have this patch, will be included in next upload.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
